outputs.output_descr: This project aims to enhance stability and improve operational capacity of the armed forces by rehabitation works and supply of reliable water and sanatationfacilites. It is expected this will help to quickly improve the living conditions of RSLAF officers and their families through in the three main and most populated barracks in the Freetown area (Wilberforce, Murray Town and Goderich).

project_descr: Rehabilitation of the Water and Sanitation Facilities for the Republic of Sierra Leone Armed Forces (RSLAF) barracks in Freetown
project_title: PBF- Rehab of WatSan Facilities for RSLAF
